climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging. MADE SAFE certifies products made without known toxic chemicals, by prohibiting substances that harm human health or the environment.

features: 16-count Regular 100% certified organic cotton no-applicator tampons are great for normal days.
Breathable and hypoallergenic. Skin pH compatible (adapting properties). No chlorine bleach, latex, parabens, perfumes, SAP, and plastics or man made materials.
Organyc proudly displays the 100% Cotton seal.
body.description: Organyc no-applicator tampons are made with 100% certified organic cotton inside and out. As with all Organyc products, these tampons give you unsurpassed absorbency and leak protection and are cotton-soft and gentle so they respect your sensitive skin.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Organyc No Applicator Tampon 100% Pure Cotton Pure, organic cotton itself is one of the softest, most gentle materials in the world. We understand the importance of respecting women's sensitive skin, which is why our products are made with 100% organic cotton throughout - no perfume, chlorine, rayon, or other potentially harmful additives. Another advantage of pure 100% organic cotton tampons is that they are skin pH compatible, so they are an excellent solution for women with sensitive skin to help avoid allergic reaction and skin irritation. Since Organyc tampons are made entirely of soft, comfortable organic cotton, everything that touches you is, of course, also organic cotton. Expressly Designed And Created For Comfort Organyc no applicator tampons have a soft, rounded tip that is designed for gentle, easy insertion. These tampons are sleek and discreet and are designed for maximum comfort and better leak protection. According to Cotton, Inc., cotton is actually able to absorb 24 times its weight in liquid, so you can feel comforted knowing that you are using a product that truly provides complete protection.

The Advantages of Cotton Cotton is nature's most absorbent natural textile, holding as much as 24 times it's weight in liquid. You can feel secure that it will protect against leaks. Rather than itchy synthetic materials, cotton created the standard for softness and set the bar for other fabrics. Synthetics can make you sweat, cotton is breathable. It is not man-made or created in a test tube and it is certainly not any kind of plastic. Cotton is nature's gift. Organyc proudly displays the 100% Cotton seal on all feminine care pads, panty liners and tampons.

Benefits: 100% cotton inside and out. Certified organic. Naturally absorbent. Breathable. Hypoallergenic. Biodegradable. Plastic-free. Chlorine bleach-free. Soft and comfortable. Not just Organic, Certified Organic There is no specific organic standard for feminine care, so, Organyc has been assimilated into the organic textile products category. Organyc products have been certified by the Soil Association, the UK’s leading organic organization, promoting sustainable food and farming through local, seasonal and organic systems. Organyc is also certified by the ICEA, Italy, the Ethical and Environmental Certification Institute, which inspects and certifies firms respectful of the environment, workers' dignity and collective rights.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Back to normal
reviews.reviewText: Never experienced an allergic reaction until I ordered a different brand of tampons. Found these and have not had any issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I buy the regular size without the applicator and they are great. They’re comfortable, I love that they do not have harsh chemicals, and they are absorbent. I have a medium flow, and on day one or two of my period they last about 4 hours. If you’re looking for a natural tampon I’d go with these!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Product great, but its box is always damaged
reviews.reviewText: Product is great, but please send this stuff in a box so product boxes don't get damaged! You never send these things in a box!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Do Not Fan Out
reviews.reviewText: Great product. I love that they don't fan out. If you need that feature to help prevent leakage, you won't like these. Personally, I find the fan out feature uncomfortable when removing, so these work great for me. I use these with a Dame applicator. I just wish they made them in a super plus.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It is super comfortable I betray feel them

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to start using applicator free tampons to help out the Earth and these are the best option I've found so far! They're so affordable, the absorbency is great, very comfortable to wear, and doesn't hurt to insert. I highly recommend switching to these! They're a great organic, natural, chemical free option!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I should have read the product description more carefully, but these are much tinier than I expected. The still work okay, but they are very expensive for the quantity and the amount use that you get out of them. Still in search of a cost-effective and eco-friendly tampon...

I really appreciate that these are organic cotton. I like to take care of my health and this product aligns with that philosophy. I appreciated that the packaging is simple and small which is great to carry around. I like that they are not bulky. I also appreciate staying fresh.
She says it is doing a good job and she is happy to found a replacement for the normal ones with the pesticides on it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 22, 2019

reviews.reviewText: Tampons qui ne se tiennent pas et s'effilochent très facilement. Ouverture difficile surtout si on n'a pas d'ongle pour tirer la languette. Préférez de loin la marque "Supers tampons bio Masmi - Fait de coton naturel" !
Super! Meine Niere sing ganz zufrieden jetzt. Normale Tampons mach die krank aber mit diese es gibt kein Problem. Ganz gut!
